other_services.description: Development of desktop-based management applications using Java Swing. Suitable for small business starters who need offline or standalone tools.
features: Inventory, staff, or sales management systems
Integration with local MySQL or cloud-hosted MongoDB Atlas
User-friendly interfaces (not fancy design) designed for non-technical users
other_services.notes: Focused on small-scale projects, not enterprise-grade systems.

other_services.description: Assistance with database-related errors, optimization, and problems for small business or personal projects.
features: Schema design for small business use cases
other_services.notes: Limited to MySQL and MongoDB databases.
